name: Bluebeard'sBride-ReleaseThyself
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bluebeards bride
des:
A horror game created for the Narrascope 2020 Game Jam, about escaping from Bluebeard, a sinister murderer...your husband. 

CW: abuse, gaslighting, gore, body horror, misogyny.

Powered by Earplay

Tim Rodriguez, design, development, production

priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
